name: THE ROOT OF ALL EVIL (DznEggs4Keira)
description:
Entry to Global Game Jam 2023.
The Theme this year was Roots.

Young Tate must serve his Deity and fight off hordes of mushrooms spawning from the mycelium taking over our beloved forests.

I hope you guys enjoy lil Tate's massacre spree :)
It doesn't feel so bad if you like eating mushrooms :D

PLAY GAME ONLINE HERE: https://gamejam23.nivruka.nl/114-2/

PORTFOLIOS

DznEggs4Keia - Programmer - https://gameinventureden.com/
Ian Rue - Audio - https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYQ4mdwytDa07LfWCEXGqmHo25CbgPp2M
Kaastronaut - Art - https://instagram.com/_itskaas?igshid=YmMyMTA2M2Y=
Game hosted online by https://www.nivcom.nl/
